org.springdata.cassandra.core

Class DefaultDeleteOperation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core.AbstractQueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,O>
      • org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core.AbstractUpdateOperation<DeleteOperation>
        • org.springdata.cassandra.core.DefaultDeleteOperation<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatchedStatementCreator, DeleteOperation, QueryCreator, QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,DeleteOperation>

    public class DefaultDeleteOperation<T>
extends AbstractUpdateOperation<DeleteOperation>
implements DeleteOperation, BatchedStatementCreator
    Implementation of the DeleteOperation. Supports two types of deletion operations: by Id and by Entity.
    Author:
    Alex Shvid
